subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Fourth-seeded Tomas Berdych lost his first match of the season, falling to Ivo Karlovic, 7-6 (6), 7-6 (4), at the Qatar Open in Doha.
snippet: Fourth-seeded Tomas Berdych lost his first match of the season, falling to Ivo Karlovic, 7-6 (6), 7-6 (4), at the Qatar Open in Doha.
